markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Leshy Glide](/Feats.aspx?ID=1044) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 55 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Leaf Leshy](/Heritages.aspx?ID=47) heritage or [Cat Fall](/Feats.aspx?ID=765)

</column>

---

Using your own leaves, you can control your descent. You glide slowly toward the ground, 5 feet down and up to 25 feet forward through the air. As long as you spend at least 1 action gliding each round and have not yet reached the ground, you remain in the air at the end of your turn.
name: Leshy Glide
prerequisite: Leaf Leshy heritage or Cat Fall

summary_markdown: Using your own leaves, you can control your descent.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 5" pfs="Standard" > Leshy Glide Single Action Source Character Guide pg. 55 2.0 Prerequisites Leaf Leshy heritage or Cat Fall --- Using your own leaves, you can control your descent. You glide slowly toward the ground, 5 feet down and up to 25 feet forward through the air. As long as you spend at least 1 action gliding each round and have not yet reached the ground, you remain in the air at the end of your turn.
